short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape Shopify products of any store into CSV files.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Export products of any Shopify store and copy their products.

You can use the extension to get products CSV of any Shopify site and use it with your store. It helps you export all products or by collections in a few clicks.

**Features:**
- Quickly export products CSV
- Export all products or by collections
- Supports variants with images
- Supports products with multiple images
- Up to 500 products per export

The products CSV generated by this extension is fully Shopify-compatible and can be imported into your store.
